DW53.cn_text: 一些早期的测试者说，剑尖造成了不愉快的体验，但是真正的大师们会利用它们来发挥自己的优势。
DW53.en_text: Some early testers said that the spikes made for an unpleasant experience, but true masters use them to their advantage.

DA103.en_text: Who said brute force isn't enough? This arm protection will scare foes away with one glance alone.

DA22.cn_text: 青铜和钢的混合提供了很好的保护，使你的
DA22.en_text: A mix of bronze and steel offers great protection and makes your

DS126.en_text: A fine work of art, this shield belongs on a castle wall, not on the battlefield.

DW52.cn_text: 来自全国各地的剑士都研究过这把剑的设计，并得出结论，确实很少见。
DW52.en_text: Swordmasters from all around the land have studied the design of this sword and come to the conclusion that it is quite rare indeed.

DW119.en_text: A slightly enhanced version of the peasant pitchfork, this one will allow you to riot in style.

DB16.cn_text: 这款胸甲配有时尚腰带，让您变得非常吸睛。
DB16.en_text: This brigandine comes with a trendy belt that will keep no eyes away from you as you pass.

DW110.en_text: A golden axe that will not only flaunt your wealth, but also chop off enemy limbs.

DH07.cn_text: 完全由青铜制成的蒙面诺曼头盔。
DH07.en_text: A masked norman helmet made entirely out of bronze.

DW109.en_text: This unusual hammer comes with sharp points, making it practical for both crushing and stabbing your enemies.

DW51.cn_text: 许多船长都喜欢这种设计，因为它提供了更多的机动性，但仍然致命。
DW51.en_text: Many sea captains favor this design as it provides more mobility, yet remains deadly.

DW54.cn_text: 你挥舞着这把锤子时，你的敌人将无法享受你全速奔跑的叹息。
DW54.en_text: Your enemies will not enjoy the sighft of you running at them full speed while wielding this hammer.

DS35.cn_text: 一个用钢制成的普通红色盾牌。
DS35.en_text: A plain red shield rimmed with steel.

DS124.en_text: The wooden shield of loom is said to give its owners glimpses of what will happen in future battles.

DS125.en_text: Owners of this shield are said to have near godlike abilities to track their enemies from far away.

DB119.en_text: A flamboyant piece of clothing that is sure to draw looks from most ladies, and possibly some lords in court.

DA21.cn_text: 青铜和钢的层允许同时移动和保护。 确实是一种致命的混合。
DA21.en_text: Layers of bronze and steel allow mobility and protection at the same time. A deadly mix indeed.

DW118.en_text: A sturdy hammer with a sharp end to it for easy thrusting.

DS129.en_text: Run into battle with this sturdy wooden shield full of color.

DS68.cn_text: 这个盾牌可能会破裂，但它仍会保护你免受敌人的打击。
DS68.en_text: This shield may be cracked, but it will still protect you from enemy blows.

DS66.cn_text: 这种盾牌提供了很好的保护，并装饰有宗教符号。
DS66.en_text: This shield offers great protection and is decorated with religious symbols.

DH94.cn_text: 适合有信仰之领主的青铜头盔。
DH94.en_text: A bronze helmet for men of faith.

DW67.cn_text: 一种新型的斧头设计，重量轻，仍然足够锋利，可以杀死任何敌人。
DW67.en_text: A new type of axe design that is light in weight and still sharp enough to kill.

DB118.en_text: A blue vest held together by thin laced rope.

DW02.cn_text: 有一些剑就是为莽夫定制的，一定要小心挥舞着它的人。
DW02.en_text: Some swords were made for rough people. Beware of whoever bears it.

DW108.en_text: The black steel used to forge the ball of this morningstar is heavy enough to crush a viking skull.

DB85.cn_text: 丰富多彩的胸甲，不仅拥有潇洒的外形，还可以保护您免受敌人的打击。
DB85.en_text: A colorful arrangement that is not only dashing, but will also protect you from enemy blows.

DA62.cn_text: 这套护手可以在拳拳到肉的战斗中派上用场。
DA62.en_text: This plated set of arm protection could come in handy in a fist fight.

DS64.cn_text: 这种护盾不仅看起来很棒，而且还可以保护你免受刀剑的伤害。
DS64.en_text: Not only does this shield look great, it will also keep you safe from sword and arrows alike.

DW76.cn_text: 这款精美匕首采用金色饰边和钢制刀片设计。
DW76.en_text: An exquisite dagger with a gold trim and steel blade.

DS127.en_text: A gold-lined shield displaying some strange sign.

DW121.en_text: An ancient piece of weaponry, this spear is said to be blessed by a network of highly intelligent druids.

DW50.cn_text: 不熟悉这种剑形设计的勇士经常会伤到自己，但是如果正确使用它就会变成致命的武器。
DW50.en_text: Warriors not familiar with this sword design often hurt themselves, but it is deadly when wielded correctly.

DA20.cn_text: 黄金装甲护手保证灵活运动的同时，提供完善的防击打能力。
DA20.en_text: Plates of gold allow for flexible movements while offering full protection from blows.

DW55.cn_text: 第一步，将敌人的头放在这把锤子下面。 第二步，将头骨砸到地上。
DW55.en_text: Step one, place your enemy's head under this hammer. Step two, smash their skull into the ground.

DS34.cn_text: 拥有这个壮观的盾牌，就像老鹰翱翔于天际。
DS34.en_text: Rule like the eagle up high meant you to with this spectacular shield.

DB15.cn_text: 穿着这件令人恐惧的服装，似乎可以将你的意志强加给敌人。
DB15.en_text: Impose your will onto others with this frightening attire.

DW113.en_text: A perfect weapon from keeping your enemies at a safe distance.

DH06.cn_text: 就像是金色皇冠一般的蒙面诺曼头盔，彰显领主的高贵本质。
DH06.en_text: A masked norman helmet with a golden crown to show the noble nature of your lord.

DA110.en_text: A thick shoulder pad over red velvet provides ample protection while looking exquisite.

DW107.en_text: A wieldy hammer that is light enough to swing around with ease.

DA78.cn_text: 有些领主无法应对狂热的战斗，这副护手证明你可以。
DA78.en_text: Some lords cannot handle the heat of combat, this pauldron proves that you can.

DW116.en_text: A short sword with a lovely emerald hilt.

DB117.en_text: A colorful shirt accentuated by a thick belt.

DS32.cn_text: 通过挥舞这块盾牌来展示狮子的力量。
DS32.en_text: Show the might of the lion by brandishing it on your shield.

DW04.cn_text: 普通士兵所用的木制把手的长矛。攻击力还不错，但这不是一把能在战场上扭转乾坤的武器。
DW04.en_text: A spear with wooden handle for the common soldier. Does the job well but will not turn heads by any means.

DA54.cn_text: 一套干净，抛光的镀金护手。
DA54.en_text: A clean and polished set of plated gold armor.

DW106.en_text: An unusual spear that will scare off weak-willed opponents.

DW57.cn_text: 战锤是掌握的强硬武器，但如果使用得当，值得付出努力。
DW57.en_text: The warhammer is a tough weapon to master, but well worth the effort when used correctly.

DS122.en_text: The sun of loom will grant luck to those who use this shield on the field of battle.

DH93.cn_text: 真正的领主只接受荣耀的馈赠。 这个由纯金制成的头盔应该足以取悦他。
DH93.en_text: The true lord only accepts grand offerings. This helmet made out of solid gold should be enough to please him.

DW112.en_text: Daggers such as this one are finely crafted and will protect your lord from assassins.

DS33.cn_text: 使用这块装饰有鹰的钢盾，让你的军队力量飙升。
DS33.en_text: Let the might of your armies soar high with this eagle-adorned steel shield.

DA19.cn_text: 钢护手赋予您的领主灵活性和最终的手臂保护。
DA19.en_text: Layers of steel give your lord flexibility and the ultimate amount of protection.

DS65.cn_text: 这块盾牌不是最灵活的一种，但它提供了对身体的全面保护。
DS65.en_text: The pavise shield is not the most flexible model, but it offers full protection of the body.

DS121.en_text: The sign of loom adorns this shield, but will the fools on the enemy heed its call?

DW115.en_text: A growling lion hilt with an emerald grip make this a truly fine sword fit for a lord.

DB49.cn_text: 弓箭手的铠甲带有许多皮带，可以更加支撑领主的腰部。
DB49.en_text: An archer's brigandine with many leather straps to keep your lord's armor in place.

DS72.cn_text: 让异教徒来吧，这块盾牌会保护你。
DS72.en_text: Let the heathens come at you. Your shield will protect you.

DS63.cn_text: 这个盾牌非常简单，但它仍然可以完成防御工作。
DS63.en_text: This shield is pretty much as simple as it can be, but it will still get the job done.

DH40.cn_text: 带有实心黄金打造遮阳板的钢制头盔，用于保护面部。
DH40.en_text: A steel helmet with a solid gold visor to protect the face.

DW74.cn_text: 一把薄而圆的匕首，会给受害者带来可怕的痛苦。
DW74.en_text: A thin, circular dagger that will inflict terrible pain to its victims.

DS123.en_text: This old wooden shield has some strange emerald sign at its center. The people who put it there must be some form of lost tribe.

DB48.cn_text: 黑色皮甲将使敌人畏缩，并让你的领主看起来更加神秘...
DB48.en_text: A black leather armor will make the enemy cower with fear and give your lord's look a certain je ne sais quoi...

DW111.en_text: Daggers are good for stabbing and easy to conceal.

DB116.en_text: A white shirt with a brown vest and sturdy belt.

DB14.cn_text: 传说中这些鳞片是在像太阳一样炎热的火中锻造而成。
DB14.en_text: Legends say these scales were forged in a fire as hot as the sun.

DW56.cn_text: 这个青铜战锤可以用来粉碎，刺伤和切割你的敌人。
DW56.en_text: This bronze warhammer can be used to smash, stab and slice your enemies.

DB71.cn_text: 这款时尚的黄色布料制作而成的上衣配有坚固的皮带。
DB71.en_text: A stylish outfit of yellow cloth with a sturdy leather belt.

DB70.cn_text: 白色的钢制胸甲，可以在白雪皑皑的战场上提供伪装。
DB70.en_text: A white steel body armor that will camouflage you on snowy battlefields.

DB115.en_text: Blue and black squares show the devotion you have to your flag and liege lord.

DW77.cn_text: 金色匕首，黑色手柄。适合切割或背刺敌人。
DW77.en_text: A gold dagger with a black grip. Perfect for cutting fancy meat or stabbing your enemies in the back.

DB84.cn_text: 这个胸甲上的线只指向一个方向，向上。
DB84.en_text: The lines on this cuirass only point one direction, upwards.

DW104.en_text: This sword was forged in the depth of a dark cave, and looks mysterious as frick.

DA18.cn_text: 精美的线条点缀这款坚固的金色护手。
DA18.en_text: Finely carved lines adorn this solid gold arm protection.

DH60.cn_text: 这款头盔采用传统设计，并配有金色装饰。
DH60.en_text: This helmet is based on a traditional designed and has been enhanced with gold decorations.

DW73.cn_text: 一个粗糙的晨星与大尖刺球。
DW73.en_text: A crude  morningstar with large spiked ball.

DH92.cn_text: 该头盔使用青铜面罩来保护面部，而头部仍然用钢覆盖。
DH92.en_text: Protect the face a dashing bronze facemask, while the head remains covered in steel.

DB114.en_text: Looking fancy is an easy task while strutting around in this dashing piece of clothing.

DA17.cn_text: 穿戴这个金色铠甲护手会告诉你的敌人：你不是一个容易被搞定的人。
DA17.en_text: Gold pauldrons and gauntlets will show you are not a man to be messed with.

DW117.en_text: The curvature of this sword makes each stab extra painful to your enemies.

DW49.cn_text: 用这把钢剑保护你的手和你的朋友。
DW49.en_text: Protect your hands and your friends with this steel sword.

DH04.cn_text: 为了荣耀与主，戴上这镀金的头盔吧。
DH04.en_text: Show the lord you truly care by wearing adorning your helmet with gold in his honor.

DA67.cn_text: 厚厚的金板和厚厚的手套将确保您的安全。
DA67.en_text: Thick plates of gold and a thick gauntlet will keep you safe.

DH57.cn_text: 宽大的封闭式头盔，看起来令人生畏并提供头部保护。
DH57.en_text: A broadfaced closed helmet that looks intimidating and provides protection.

DA86.cn_text: 许多人会尝试，但是一个穿着这么厚的护手的男人不会轻易受伤。
DA86.en_text: Many will try, but a man wearing armor this thick will not be hurt easily.

DS120.en_text: A white shield brandishing a strange sign. Is this some new strange religion or something else?

DW127.en_text: A fine sword said to be crafted in honor of Lord Dapp himself.

DS31.cn_text: 这款盾牌采用贵重金属制成，坚固耐用，可同时保护您并提供很高的价值。
DS31.en_text: Lined with precious metal, this shield is rugged and will keep you protected and looking wealthy at the same time.

DH05.cn_text: 一个为鼻子部位带来额外保护的柳钉诺尔曼头盔。
DH05.en_text: A riveted Norman helmet with a nose guard will offer good protection to warriors on the front.

DW01.cn_text: 这根长矛将刺穿任何敌人和装甲。
DW01.en_text: This thick spear will pierce through any enemy, armored or not.

DB113.en_text: A simple leather vest that seems to have a particular appeal to high-born ladies.

DH105.en_text: An imposing helmet that will protect your head and keep your vision clear.

DA48.cn_text: 这是一套厚实又精美的皮革铠装护腕。护手部分用黄金打造。
DA48.en_text: Fine leather pauldrons and bracers on a thick green shirt. The fist of gold ties it all together quite well.

DB13.cn_text: 在罗马时代，使用代表帝皇的颜色曾经是一种严重的罪行。 世事变迁呐......
DB13.en_text: Donning the emperor's color used to be a grave offense during Roman times. How things have changed…

DB47.cn_text: 当穿着它在战场上战斗时，一系列坚固的带子可以保证领主的安全。
DB47.en_text: An array of sturdy straps will keep your lord well-secured as he fights on the battlefield.

DB112.en_text: A robust belt buckle is usually the mark of real power. The gold fabric collar is just a bonus.

DS62.cn_text: 据说拜占庭战士将这个盾牌带到了我们的土地上。
DS62.en_text: A Byzantine warrior is said to have brought this shield onto our lands.

DW126.en_text: This sword is said to be crafted by a man who foretold a prophecy of decentralized applications. Nobody knew what he was talking about.

DA16.cn_text: 猫的印记将解决辩论; 猫肯定比狗好。
DA16.en_text: The sigil of the cat will settle the debate; cats are definitely better than dogs.

DS29.cn_text: 圆形盾牌，雕刻有精致的凯尔特标记。
DS29.en_text: A round sheld carved with fine celtic markings.

DW120.en_text: The emerald seal of this spear is said to be infused with magical powers.

DA46.cn_text: 厚实，重叠的护垫与这个方形的护腕一起提供出色的保护。
DA46.en_text: Thick, overlapping pauldrons provide excellent protection along with this squared bracer.

DS117.en_text: A strange type of ship is printed onto this shield. Are those vikings or something even worse?

DS118.en_text: A battle-hardened shield that has seen some rough open seas in its days.

DB52.cn_text: 适合国王的盔甲，雕刻在胸前的金色装饰将激励你的战士们！
DB52.en_text: An armor fit for a king, the gold decorations carved on your breast will inspire your men on the battlefield!

DS28.cn_text: 描绘传奇格里芬的盾牌。 这有可能成为一个国家的象征吗？
DS28.en_text: A shield depicting a legendary griffin. Could this become the symbol of a nation one day?

DA15.cn_text: 纯金护手不是最强大的保护，但会激发朋友和敌人的敬畏。
DA15.en_text: Solid gold pauldrons are not the strongest protection, but will inspire awe in friend and foes alike.

DS59.cn_text: 龙的灵魂寄宿于这个盾牌之中。
DS59.en_text: The soul of the dragon lives through this shield.

DB111.en_text: Made out of the finest material, it would be hard to look more dashing than when wearing this shirt.

DH91.cn_text: 将钢与金混合将提供极大的保护，让您一下子看起来很富有。
DH91.en_text: Mixing steel with gold will offer great protection and make you look wealthy all at once.

DH62.cn_text: 带有眼睛特殊保护的黄金诺曼头盔。
DH62.en_text: A golden norman helmet with eye protection.

DW125.en_text: This sword is said to start vibrating rapidly the closer it gets to enemy officers.

DB12.cn_text: 另一片大陆的草可能更绿，而这些胸甲鳞片会让你在征服的道路上提供最大的保护。
DB12.en_text: The grass may be greener on the other side, and these scales will keep you alive on the way to conquer that patch.

DH39.cn_text: 坚固的青铜制轻便头盔。
DH39.en_text: A solid bronze bertholdt sallet helmet.

DW46.cn_text: 一把黑色握把的剑，经典又致命。
DW46.en_text: A sword with a black grip that is classic yet deadly.

DW100.cn_text: 当这把剑从剑鞘中抽出时不会发出任何的声响。
DW100.en_text: This sword won't make a sound when it is removed from its scabbard.

DS58.cn_text: 在这块盾牌中，木头和钢铁完美地融合在一起。
DS58.en_text: Wood and steel come together perfectly in this shield.

DW128.en_text: A solid axe with a bronze head and fine emerald cloth.

DA77.cn_text: 在你的护手上佩戴鹰的标识，让你的敌人知道你在为谁而战。
DA77.en_text: Wearing the standard of the eagle on your armor let's your enemies know who you represent easily.

DB110.en_text: These unique clasps offer a particuliar look.

DW103.cn_text: 据说这把剑是由达鸿飞亲手锻造而成。
DW103.en_text: This sword is said to have been crafted by none other than Da Hongfei himself.

DH90.cn_text: 说实话，谁看到这个头盔都会感到不寒而栗。
DH90.en_text: Be honest, who could see this helmet without getting at least a little scared.

DH98.cn_text: 布头巾和面具掩盖你的身份。 适合那些想成为土匪的人。
DH98.en_text: A cloth bandana and mask to mask your identity. Perfect for those aiming to become bandits.

DA14.cn_text: 镀青铜的护手强度可能不如纯钢，但它看起来确实令人印象深刻。
DA14.en_text: Bronze-plated armor may not be as strong as pure steel, but it sure looks impressive.

DH03.cn_text: 看到勇敢而又虔的诚骑士戴着这样一顶头盔, 异教徒们都会落荒而逃。
DH03.en_text: Heathens will cower at the sight of any brave knight wearing this helmet.

DW45.cn_text: 这把剑装饰着宝石和金色刀柄，是真正财富的缩影。
DW45.en_text: Adorned with a gemstone and gold hilt, this sword is the epitome of true wealth.

DH48.cn_text: 带有金十字架装饰的十字军头盔。
DH48.en_text: A crusader helm adorned with a gold cross.

DB83.cn_text: 厚厚的皮革贴片由坚固的皮带绑定，制成了这个伟大的皮革盔甲。
DB83.en_text: Thick leather patches sown together and closed by sturdy straps form a great leather armor.

DS26.cn_text: 一个钢制盾牌上刻有三个芙蓉纹章。
DS26.en_text: A steel shield with a trio of fleur de lis carved on it.

DB11.cn_text: 如果你的血是贵族之蓝，那么胸甲下面的布也应该是那样的颜色。
DB11.en_text: If your blood is blue, so should the cloth beneath your armor be.

DW123.en_text: Anyone who wields a rugged morningstar such as this one is sure to make his enemies run in fear.

DB69.cn_text: 这款黄色衬垫采用精美黑色皮带制成。
DB69.en_text: A padded yellow vest with fine black leater straps.

DS114.en_text: A tilted cross composed out of strange colors, said to be inspired by a strange thing known as a gamer.

DB109.en_text: A white linen shirt that is light yet elegant.

DS56.cn_text: 这个盾牌饱经风霜，但它仍然坚持了下来。
DS56.en_text: This shield has seen better days, but it still holds up.

DB46.cn_text: 皮带将这种钢制的胸甲装甲固定在适当的位置，让您可以轻松战斗。
DB46.en_text: A leather belt holds this steel-scaled brigandine armor in place, allowing you to fight with ease.

DW42.cn_text: 这把斧头可以轻易的斩下敌人的头颅。
DW42.en_text: Your enemy's head will be no match when this axe cracks right through it.

DS30.en_text: A sturdy, yet simple, steel shield.

DH101.cn_text: 这个青铜头盔会在你的敌人心中灌输恐惧。
DH101.en_text: This bronze helmet will instill fear in the hearts of your enemies.

DS27.cn_text: 一个精美的盾牌，雕刻有红色和白色条纹和美丽的皇冠。
DS27.en_text: A masterful kite helmet with red and white stripes and beautiful crown paintings.

DA38.cn_text: 黄金铠片提供肩部保护，并使得这副皮革护手更加突出。
DA38.en_text: Golden pauldrons provide shoulder protection and highlights the leather gloves of this set.

DH49.cn_text: 坚固的钢制十字军头盔，有巨大的钢铁十字架装饰和多个呼吸孔。
DH49.en_text: A solid steel crusader helmet with a large cross depiction and multiple breathing holes.

DA12.cn_text: 你的领主可能不是最富有的人，但他可以带着这护手砸穿黄金砖墙。
DA12.en_text: Your lord may not be the richest, but he can punch through a bric wall with these arms.

DB108.en_text: With thick padding, sturdy straps, and a strong belt, your lord will be protected and mobile on the battlefield.

DH02.cn_text: 用巴塞尼特面罩蒙住你的脸可能会阻碍你的视线, 但它会保护你。
DH02.en_text: Covering your face with a bascinet visor may obstruct your vision but will keep you protected.

DS116.en_text: A tribal shield inspired by the vastness of the open sea.

DH102.cn_text: 真正的数字勇士将带上这强大的头盔并跳入战局。
DH102.en_text: A true crypto warrior will not jump into battle without the most dashing helmet.

DS24.cn_text: 皮革扣环护盾，用铆钉和钢筋加固。
DS24.en_text: A leather buckler shield reinforced with rivets and steel bars.

DA85.cn_text: 那些敢于与老鹰的力量相悖的人将不会长寿。
DA85.en_text: Those who dare contradict the might of the eagle will not live long.

DW43.cn_text: 金色的刀柄和黑色的握把使这把剑的轻钢看起来是白色的。
DW43.en_text: The gold hilt and black grip make the light steel of this sword appear white.

DH103.cn_text: NEO的力量将始终保持你的领主安全！
DH103.en_text: The power of NEO will keep your lord safe at all times!

DS55.cn_text: 金盾，可以保护您免受伤害。
DS55.en_text: A gold shield that will protect you from harm.

DH89.cn_text: 这款头盔会让你看起来既聪明又强大。
DH89.en_text: This helmet will make you look smart and powerful at the same time.

DH47.cn_text: 带护颈的钢制三角头盔。
DH47.en_text: A steel sallet helmet with protective neck guard.

DH45.cn_text: 这款头盔由钢和金制成，可让领主保持头部灵活的同时拥有清晰的视野。
DH45.en_text: Made out of steel and gold, this barbute helmet will keep your lord mobile and able to see clearly.

DH107.en_text: This visored helmet has a narrow slit to view out of that can be raised at any time.

DS112.en_text: The design of this shield is said to come from a land in the north where the sun rarely shines.

DB10.cn_text: 一种多系带的布里甘丁胸甲, 特别受到弓箭手的欢迎。
DB10.en_text: A multi-strapped brigandine armour popular with archers and crossbowmen in particular.

DB107.en_text: This leather vest protects from light blows and has a true bad boy appeal.

DS113.en_text: Fine metal carvings give this wooden shield a truly majestic look.

DW41.cn_text: 用这把强大的长矛杀死那些用虚假的言语对付你的人。
DW41.en_text: Slay those who speak falsehoods against you with this mighty spear.

DS111.en_text: This shield survived many battles, but still remains a loyal servant in battle.

DB106.en_text: Etiquette states that the more button your coat has, the more distinguished your lord is.

DB68.cn_text: 这款蓝色马甲采用精美黑色皮革带子设计。
DB68.en_text: A padded blue vest with fine black leather straps.

DA11.cn_text: 该护手设计中沿着手臂的一条金线会让你与其他暴徒做出区分。
DA11.en_text: A line of gold along your arm will set you apart from the rest of the rabble.

DH50.cn_text: 坚固的金色十字军头盔，饰有十字架。
DH50.en_text: A solid gold crusader helmet adorned with a cross.

DW40.cn_text: 带铆接手柄的凯尔特矛。 轻巧，易于在战斗中使用。
DW40.en_text: A celtic spear with a riveted handle. Lightweight and easy to use in combat.

DB45.cn_text: 绿松石色的胸甲，具有坚固的钢板和漂亮的腰带。
DB45.en_text: A turquoise brigandine with solid steel plates and a nice belt.

DA49.cn_text: 据说这套护手的绝对力量震慑了大陆上不止一位君主。
DA49.en_text: The sheer power held in this set of plated arm protection is said to have shocked more than one monarch across the land.

DS53.cn_text: 一个金属盾牌，有详细的雕刻，以前拯救了不止一个战士。
DS53.en_text: A metal shield with detailed carvings that has saved more than one warrior before.

DA10.cn_text: 宽大的护手甲为您的手臂提供了完美的保护。
DA10.en_text: Broad pauldrons make this perfect protection for your arms.

DB50.cn_text: 设计优雅的绿色胸甲，由专业制作的皮革带子固定。
DB50.en_text: An elegantly designed green brigandine armor, secured by expertly crafted leather straps.

DH38.cn_text: 这款实心的黄金轻便头盔采用钢制护面设计。
DH38.en_text: A solid gold sallet helmet with a steel face guard.

DA76.cn_text: 穿着金色护手会让你成为小年轻们在战场上的第一目标，但它足以给你一定的防护。
DA76.en_text: Wearing golden armor will make you a target on the battlefield for young upstarts, but this one is durable enough.

DB67.cn_text: 这款衬垫背心采用精美黑色皮革带子设计。
DB67.en_text: Padded vest with fine black leather straps.

DH59.cn_text: 这种头盔的广泛设计使其佩戴者看起来特别令人生畏。
DH59.en_text: The broad design of this helmet makes its wearer look especially intimidating.

DH53.cn_text: 一顶带有呼吸孔和一个威胁性缝隙的头盔，领主可以从中看到周围的环境。
DH53.en_text: A visored helmet with breathing holes and a menacing slit to view your surroundings out of.

DB105.en_text: This black vest is elegant and distinguished.

DB104.en_text: A black tunic with a thick studded belt.

DA13.cn_text: 制作这种手臂保护装置的黄金数量显示，使用它的人不会被搞砸。
DA13.en_text: The amount of gold that went into crafting this arm protection shows the one who wields it is not to be messed with.

DS52.cn_text: 精美的艺术品，这个盾牌将保护你的领主并炫耀他的好品味。
DS52.en_text: A fine work of art, this shield will protect your lord and flaunt his good taste.

DA09.cn_text: 皮革护手提供手部保护，而皮革护套则保护您的肩膀。 整个护手呈现出一个让人喜爱的风格。
DA09.en_text: Leather gauntlets offer hand protection while the leather pauldron will keep your shoulders safe. All together in a lovely style.

DB09.cn_text: 这些组装的板块碎片其实是足够灵活并且支持一定程度的动作, 而且仍然具有一定的防击打能力。
DB09.en_text: These assembled fragments of plate are flexible enough to allow movement but will still protect against blows.

DW38.cn_text: 在制作这种钉头锤时使用了一种独特的染料，使其具有这种特殊的颜色。
DW38.en_text: A unique dye was used during the crafting of this mace to give it this particular color.

DW37.cn_text: 北欧的遗物，既致命又细腻。
DW37.en_text: A Nordic relic that is both deadly and delicate.

DS23.cn_text: 用于应对最严重打击的钢制扣环盾牌。
DS23.en_text: A  steel buckler made to handle the toughest blows.

DA70.cn_text: 使用稀有的紫色钢制成了这些臂板，最终组成了这个护手。
DA70.en_text: Rare purple steel was used to create these arm plates.

DH88.cn_text: 那些不喜欢这顶头盔的人，至少可以说是傻子。
DH88.en_text: Those who do not run at the sight of this helmet would be fools to say the least.

DB82.cn_text: 这款蓝色防弹衣采用钢质铆钉制成，全部采用精美皮带固定。
DB82.en_text: A blue body armor with steel rivets, all held together by a nice leather belt.

DS22.cn_text: 用蓝钢制成的扣环盾牌。 至少可以说是一件独特的作品。
DS22.en_text: A buckler shield made out of blue steel. A unique piece to say the least.

DS108.en_text: The fire star will bring your men home.

DS109.en_text: The seal displays a powerful ancient snake, ready to bite its foes.

DS51.cn_text: 木制盾牌，镶有钢，饰有大型金属十字架。
DS51.en_text: A wooden shield rimmed with steel and adorned with a large metal cross.

DB103.en_text: This blue tunic is relaxed with a long belt.

DH51.cn_text: 一个封闭的带有钢护颈的金色头盔。
DH51.en_text: A closed golden helmet with steel neck guard.

DS61.cn_text: 狼的力量和狡猾激发了这个盾牌的设计。
DS61.en_text: The strength and cunning of the wolf inspired the design of this shield.

DA39.cn_text: 这副护手在锁子甲的基础上增加黄金板甲片，看起来非常华丽并且可以提供手臂保护。
DA39.en_text: Gold plate armor on top of chainmail will keep your arms safe and look really flashy.

DW97.cn_text: 据说，这把剑的守护者有一天会起来声称他的真正与生俱来的权力。
DW97.en_text: It is said that the keeper of this sword will one day rise to claim his true birthright.

DS54.cn_text: 用这个青铜盾牌抵挡敌人的冲击力。
DS54.en_text: Brace yourself for enemy impact with this bronze shield.

DA08.cn_text: 复杂的设计，钢制的护手带有装饰线条。
DA08.en_text: An intricate design with steel pauldrons and gauntlets adorned with decorative lines.

DB102.cn_text: 由分层皮革片组成的一个耐用和灵活的防护胸甲。
DB102.en_text: Layered leather sheets form a durable and flexible body armor.

DH96.cn_text: 当你斩杀敌人时，头顶的这一带有金色十字架的头盔会让敌人知道你信仰的虔诚。
DH96.en_text: The golden cross will let your enemies know your faith right as you cut them down.

DB44.cn_text: 红色上衣装饰有坚固的钢板。
DB44.en_text: A red tunic adorned with sturdy steel plates.

DS57.cn_text: 一个磨损的金属盾，使用前需要一些维护，但仍然可以抵御敌人的攻击。
DS57.en_text: A worn metal buckler shield that could use some maintenance but still holds up against enemy attacks.

DH61.cn_text: 这款头盔的制作不仅是为了保护头部和眼睛，也是为了使敌人心怀恐惧。
DH61.en_text: This helmet was created not only to protect the head and eyes, but also to strike fear in the hearts of your enemies.

DA07.cn_text: 一套镀金的手臂, 带着金色的边缘, 任何人都会投来钦佩的目光。
DA07.en_text: A plated set of arm protection with golden edges that will bring admiration to the eyes of your foes.

DS20.cn_text: 金色的护盾将在战场上闪耀，吸引敌人的目光。
DS20.en_text: A golden buckler shield will shine across the battlefield and draw the eyes of your enemy.

DW36.cn_text: 斧头可能被视为野兽的武器，但用纯金制造的斧头可能会改变这一观点。
DW36.en_text: The axe may be seen as a brute's weapon, but crafting the head out of pure gold may change opinions.

DW35.cn_text: 带有金色刀片的长矛可以穿透敌人的心灵。
DW35.en_text: A spear with golden blades that can pierce through the heart and mind of your enemy.

DS21.cn_text: 一个完全由青铜制成的扣环盾牌，准备战斗。
DS21.en_text: A buckler shield made entirely out of bronze and ready for battle.

DS49.cn_text: 母狮将尽一切努力保护她的幼崽。 作为一个领主，你应该和一头母狮一样。
DS49.en_text: The mother of lions will do whatever it takes to protect her cubs. As a lord, you should be the same way with your people.

DS19.cn_text: 装饰有部落纹章的皮革塔吉盾牌。
DS19.en_text: A leather targe shield adorned with tribal decorations.

DB66.cn_text: 一种宏伟的紫色调设计，使领主看起来时尚又胜券在握。
DB66.en_text: A grandiose purple color that will make your lord appear stylish and in control.

DW99.cn_text: 狮子的咆哮力量已经注入到这剑身中。挥舞它吧!
DW99.en_text: The roar of the lion has been infused into the power of this sword. Use it at your own risk!

DH37.en_text: A steel sallet with a golden faceguard.

DS50.cn_text: 坚固的钢盾牌装饰着许多铆钉。
DS50.en_text: A solid steel shield adorned with many rivets.

DB101.cn_text: 这款蓝色上衣采用皮带和绑带设计。
DB101.en_text: A blue tunic with leather belt and straps.

DA84.cn_text: 巨大而专业的锻造青铜板将让您的主人保持潇洒和安全。
DA84.en_text: Large, expertly forged bronze plates will keep your lord dashing and safe.

DW93.cn_text: 这把剑是为了杀死富人。 你接受挑战吗？
DW93.en_text: This sword was made to slay the wealthy. Do you accept the challenge?

DS105.en_text: The cross of gold on this shield is covered by a roaring lion.

DS106.en_text: The two roaring lions will usher in a new era.

DH87.cn_text: 有人说这个头盔上的铭文讲述了古代神灵的故事，但没有人能够破译它们。
DH87.en_text: Some say that the inscriptions on this helmet tell stories of teh ancient gods, but nobody has been able to decipher them.

DB08.cn_text: 步兵常用的软垫胸甲，用绳子把软垫绑在一起。
DB08.en_text: A padded armour commonly used by foot soldiers. The rope really ties it together.

DB100.cn_text: 简单的男士简约绿色上衣。
DB100.en_text: A simple green tunic for simple men.

DS107.en_text: A regal golden lion on a blue shield.

DH01.cn_text: 面罩样式给这顶头盔带来了明显的优势，它的圆锥形设计可以卸走更多的打击力道。
DH01.en_text: A face mask brings a distinct edge to this helmet compared to other normas. It's conical shape, is designed to draw blows away from the head.

DS48.cn_text: 这种独特的设计将展示你的领主对上帝的奉献精神。
DS48.en_text: This unique design will show off your lord's devotion to his god.

DB18.cn_text: 深黄色使这款胸甲看起来更具吸引力。
DB18.en_text: A dark yellow color makes this brigandine armor look even more appealing.

DA05.cn_text: 多层皮革和鳞片将软化任何奔你而来的打击。
DA05.en_text: Multiple layers of leather and scales will soften any blow that comes your way.

DA61.cn_text: 坚固的金色装甲板，在战场上提供出色的保护。
DA61.en_text: Solid gold plates that provide excellent protection on the battlefield.

DB43.cn_text: 这些铆接钢片可以保护您的胸部。
DB43.en_text: Protect your chest with these riveted steel tiles.

DW33.cn_text: 银色刀柄上的精美雕刻表明你的领主真的知道如何挑选一把大剑。
DW33.en_text: Fine carvings on a silver hilt shows your lord truly knows how to pick a great sword.

DW94.cn_text: 一把完全由蓝钢制成的剑。
DW94.en_text: A sword made entirely out of blue steel.

DH100.cn_text: 带有宽面罩的金色头盔，可在战斗时提供最佳保护。
DH100.en_text: A gold helmet with a broad facemask to offer ultimate protection while fighting.

DS17.cn_text: 坚固的钢扣盾牌，可以防御敌人的打击。
DS17.en_text: A solid steel buckler shield to deflect your enemy's blows.

DA55.cn_text: 这套镀金护手最初由一位伟大的领主为他宣誓效忠的家兵所设计。
DA55.en_text: This set of plated arm protection was initially designed by a great lord for his sworn bannermen.

DA06.cn_text: 一套多材质组成的手臂保护, 包括护肩、链甲、厚衬衫和黑色皮手套。
DA06.en_text: A versatile set of arm protection including pauldrons, chainmail, thick shirt, and black leather gloves.

DB81.cn_text: 精美的锁链可以提供极好的防御锋利武器
DB81.en_text: Fine chain mail offers great protection against sharp weapons.

DS47.cn_text: 由大铆钉加强的复杂涂漆钢盾牌。
DS47.en_text: An intricately painted steel shield strengthened by large rivets.

DW98.cn_text: 这把剑曾经属于这片土地上最富有的领主。 后来又怎么样了呢？
DW98.en_text: This sword once belonged to the richest lord in the land. How did it end up here?

DB99.cn_text: 这个胸甲的创建者给它注入了猫的凶猛力量。一个独特的杰作。
DB99.en_text: The creator of this breastplate infused it with the power of feline ferocity. A unique masterpiece.

DA75.cn_text: 财富之鹰被印在这个金色的护手上。
DA75.en_text: The eagle of wealth is printed onto this golden pauldron.

DW32.cn_text: 一把环形剑，可以让你轻松地砍倒敌人。
DW32.en_text: A ringhilt sword that will let you cut down the enemy with ease.

DB07.cn_text: 黑色皮带和精细的钢制铆钉使这种类型的胸甲受到东方战士的欢迎。
DB07.en_text: Black leather straps and fine steel rivets have made this type of armor popular with the warriors of the East.

DS18.cn_text: 据说这个塔吉盾是由来自北部岛屿的奇怪山地战士创造的。
DS18.en_text: This targe shield is said to have been created by strange hill fighters from the isle in the north.

DA53.cn_text: 不要低估层状钢板的力量。
DA53.en_text: Do not underestimate the power of layered steel plates.

DA04.cn_text: 永远不要低估皮革在战场上的能力。这种护甲看起来可能很柔软, 但会卸掉许多传入的打击力道。
DA04.en_text: Never underestimate leather's prowess on the battlefield. These pauldrons may look soft, but will deflect many incoming blows.

DB98.cn_text: 据说在战场中的出现金色天鹅是一个好兆头。
DB98.en_text: A golden swan in the midst of a battlefield is said to be a good omen.

DS25.cn_text: 一个金色的盾牌，在其中心描绘了一头咆哮的狮子。
DS25.en_text: A golden shield with a depiction of a roaring lion in its center.

DH104.en_text: Let this rag protect your eyes from the sweat of battle.

DB42.cn_text: 坚固的绳子可以保持这种长款上衣的版型。
DB42.en_text: A sturdy rope will keep this aketon tunic in place.

DA72.cn_text: 战斗的痕迹可以提醒敌人，你早已饱经战火。
DA72.en_text: The scars of battle serve as a reminder of survived encounters with the enemy.

DH42.cn_text: 一顶加固过的头盔，可以保持头部安全的同时有足够的头部空间。
DH42.en_text: A reinforced barbute helmet to keep your head safe with ample headroom.

DA02.cn_text: 精心打造的链锁套袖, 配有肩甲和护腕, 以保护您的手臂。
DA02.en_text: Intricately crafted chain mail with a pauldron and arm guard to keep your arms protected.

DS104.en_text: A blue shield rimmed with a thick layer of gold.

DW92.cn_text: 命运给这把武器带来了沉重的力量。 你可以完成命运的指派吗？
DW92.en_text: Destiny has put a heavy burden in your hands. Are you up to the task?

DW48.cn_text: 这把剑的交叉防护形状让人想起土地的曲度。
DW48.en_text: The shape of this sword's cross-guard reminds on eof the curvature of the earth.

DA03.cn_text: 这套镀钢臂甲强大且灵活，带上它完全不会影响到力量的发挥同时提供良好的手臂保护。
DA03.en_text: Project the might of your rule with this powerful, yet flexible, plated set of arm protection.

DH56.cn_text: 金色线条使这款诺曼头盔显得更加突出。
DH56.en_text: A golden line makes this Norman face mask a bit more distinguished.

DS16.cn_text: 显示手工雕刻的狮子的美丽的钢盾。
DS16.en_text: A beautiful steel shield displaying a hand-carved lion.

DH36.cn_text: 一顶令人生畏的封闭头盔，将完全覆盖领主的头部。
DH36.en_text: An intimidating closed helm that will cover your lord fully.

DW90.cn_text: 魔鬼驻留在这把剑细密的雕刻之中。
DW90.en_text: The devil resides in the details, and this sword has plenty of them.

DA66.cn_text: 厚衬垫袖子可能无法提供很好的保护，但看起来很时尚。
DA66.en_text: A thick padded sleeve may not offer great protection, but looks quite fashionable.

DB65.cn_text: 皮革胸甲，可以让你的英雄增强防御并且行动自如。
DB65.en_text: Leather body armor that will keep your hero safe and moving easily.

DA01.cn_text: 用实心铁板打造，保护你的手臂和肩膀。
DA01.en_text: Protect the arms and shoulders with solid iron plates.

DB97.cn_text: 太阳从穿戴这个领主的身后照常升起。
DB97.en_text: The sun rises over your lord with this cuirass.

DW91.cn_text: 包裹有红布的强大长矛。
DW91.en_text: A mighty spear wrapped with some red cloth.

DH58.cn_text: 有些英雄喜欢装备这种头盔以表达对信仰的虔诚与奉献精神。对此，谁又可以轻易揶揄呢？
DH58.en_text: Some like to display their devotion to their faith by equiping glorious helmets. Who are we to judge?

DB06.en_text: A plated armour made by a fine craftsman.

DS14.en_text: A riveted buckler shield covered in leather.

DH86.cn_text: 敌人看到的最后一幕将是你从这个头盔透出的杀意目光。
DH86.en_text: The last thing your enmies will see is a set of eyes looking out of this helmet.

DB80.cn_text: 作为一名大师的作品，这只胸甲的灵感来自天鹅雄伟的姿势。
DB80.en_text: A master's work, this cuirass was inspired by the majestic posture of a swan.

DB51.cn_text: 壮观的钢制胸甲，将为您的领主带来骑士风范。
DB51.en_text: An imposing steel cuirass that will give your lord a knightly look.

DB96.cn_text: 根据一些人的说法，绿色是最棒的颜色。 有啥理由不来点儿绿呢？
DB96.en_text: Green is the best color according to some. Why not cover your lord in it?

DH97.cn_text: 这个头盔的诞生是为了纪念最近一次的十字军东征。
DH97.en_text: This helmet was created in commemoration of the latest crusade.

DB41.cn_text: 这种胸甲由稀有类型的染料制成，有独特的绿松石色。
DB41.en_text: Made from a rare type of dye, this aketon is available in a unique turquoise color.

DA45.cn_text: 皮革袖子有许多带子，可以让你的手臂保持温暖和一定的防御性。
DA45.en_text: Leather arm sleeves with many straps to keep your lord's arm warm and protected.

DS13.cn_text: 带有细节雕刻的青铜盾牌。
DS13.en_text: A bronze shield with detailed carvings.

DH106.en_text: Offering full protection, this helmet still has ample breathing holes to keep your lungs full at all times.

DH46.cn_text: 一种由青铜制成并用钢筋加固的头盔。
DH46.en_text: A barbute helmet made out of bronze and reinforced with steel.

DB64.cn_text: 红色和黑色布料的时尚裁切与皮带完美结合在一起。
DB64.en_text: A fashionable arrangement of red and black cloth with a leather belt.

DB17.cn_text: 这款胸甲采用最优质的材料制成，染成罕见的紫色。
DB17.en_text: Made with the finest materials, this brigandine is dyed with a rare purple color.

DS12.cn_text: 金色盾牌，是一件错综复杂的艺术品。
DS12.en_text: A golden shield that is an intricate work of art.

DS42.cn_text: 老鹰会保护你。 你总是可以依靠老鹰的力量。
DS42.en_text: The eagle will protect you. You can always count on the eagle.

DB150.en_text: A padded tunic with a roped belt. Simple but efficient.

DB95.cn_text: 一种简单但高效的防护胸甲。
DB95.en_text: A simple, but highly effective, body armour.

DB20.cn_text: 一种防护较弱的胸甲，可能在战场上不是很有效，但看起来绝对潇洒。
DB20.en_text: A weaker type of armor that may not be effective but looks absolutely dashing.

DS15.cn_text: 这个盾牌由钢制成，饰有金色的三重鸢尾花。
DS15.en_text: This shield is made out of steel and decorated with a golden trio of fleur de lis.

DS11.cn_text: 精心制作的盾牌，可在需要时保护您。
DS11.en_text: A well-crafted shield that will protect you in times of need.

DH44.cn_text: 坚固的金色头盔，具有无可挑剔的能见度和全面保护。
DH44.en_text: A solid gold barbute helmet with impeccable visibility and full protection.

DS45.cn_text: 北方人民崇拜的古老象征，据说这只鸟会吸食你杀死的敌人的血液。
DS45.en_text: An ancient symbol worshiped by the people of the north, the bird is said to feed from the blood of your slain enemies.

DB94.cn_text: 拼装黄色皮革贴片提供出色的保护，令人惊叹。
DB94.en_text: Assembled yellow leather patches provide excellent protection and looks stunning.

DH99.cn_text: 这个精致的头盔有一条狭长的视野，非常具有威胁性的气场，戴上这顶头盔，你将在战场上占据优势。
DH99.en_text: With a narrow and menacing slit, whoever wears this helmet will be have a distinct edge over the enemy.

DS102.cn_text: 如果你信仰它，TRON网络将保护您免受这个世界的所有邪恶！
DS102.en_text: The TRON network will protect you from all evils in this world if you worship it!

DB149.en_text: A studded brigandine armor made out of a wonderful shade of blue.

DS41.cn_text: 在战场上战斗时享受阳光的庇护。
DS41.en_text: Enjoy the protection of the sun while you fight on the battlefield.

DH55.cn_text: 这款头盔源自于诺曼入侵者，将保护其拥有者的头部和面部。
DH55.en_text: Stemming from Norman invaders, this helmet will protect the head and face of its lord.

DB05.cn_text: 在古希腊人的启发下, 铁匠在这个遗物中投入了无数的时间和精力。
DB05.en_text: Inspired by the ancient Greeks, the blacksmith put countless hours into this relic.

DA83.cn_text: 这个护手的前任主人被这片土地的所有吟游诗人所传唱，但可惜，他没有活下来。
DA83.en_text: The previous owner of this armor was celebrated by all the bards of the land, but alas he did not survive.

DA47.cn_text: 厚厚的黑色金属板，为整个手臂提供全面保护。
DA47.en_text: Thick darkened metal plates that provide full protection for the entire arm.

DS40.cn_text: 为参加前一次十字军东征的战士制作的盾牌。
DS40.en_text: A shield made for those who took part in the previous crusade.

DS103.cn_text: 举起，勇敢的战士，用NEO的传奇盾牌保护你所爱的人。
DS103.en_text: Come forth, brave warrior, and protect those you love with the legendary shield of NEO.

DB93.cn_text: 带扣带的紫色皮革贴片可以保护领主，让你看起来更加华丽。
DB93.en_text: Purple leather patches with buckle straps will protect your lord and keep him looking magnificent.

DB148.en_text: A peculiar color that lets everyone know that the owner of this body armor is a man of true nobility.

DH95.cn_text: 精心制作的钢制十字军头盔，可同时保护头部和提高视野。
DH95.en_text: A steel crusader helm carefully crafted to allow protection and visibility at the same time.

DH35.cn_text: 这是一顶黑色十字军头盔，饰有银色十字架。
DH35.en_text: A black crusader helm adorned with a silver cross.

DW28.cn_text: 金柄上的详细雕刻使这把剑不仅致命，而且是一件独特的艺术品。
DW28.en_text: Detailed carvings on the gold hilt make this sword not only deadly but a unique piece of art.

DS39.cn_text: 让古老的罗马印记在战场上给你力量。
DS39.en_text: Let the sigil of the ancient roamans give you strength on the battlefield.

DA74.cn_text: 一个勇敢的敌人竭尽全力伤害这副护手的前任主人，但他一直没能占据上风。
DA74.en_text: A brave enemy tried his best to hurt the previous owner of this armor, but he did not prevail.

DB92.cn_text: 很少有人在战场上看到这件胸甲后还能活着讲述它的美丽。
DB92.en_text: Few have seen this armor up close and live to tell of its beauty.

DH85.cn_text: 这款青铜头盔采用经典款式设计。
DH85.en_text: A bronze helmet with a classic twist.

DB21.cn_text: 穿着这件胸甲的夜间攻击会让你无法被察觉。
DB21.en_text: A night attack wearing this armor will make you nearly invisible.

DW29.cn_text: 一把致命的剑用耐用钢锻造而成。
DW29.en_text: A deadly sword forged out of durable steel.

DB147.en_text: A plate steel armor sure to draw the admiration from warriors all across the land.

DH43.cn_text: 钢制头盔，可提供全面保护和可视性。
DH43.en_text: A reinforced steel barbute helmet that allows full protection and visibility.

DS96.cn_text: 紫色钢材是稀有和精致的，使这种盾牌成为一种独特的艺术品。
DS96.en_text: Purple steel is rare and exquisite, making this shield a unique work of art.

DB40.cn_text: 这条绳带上的结将让您在这款棕色的上衣中看起来更加时尚和安全。
DB40.en_text: The knot on this rope belt will keep you looking fashionble and secure in this brown aketon.

DS10.cn_text: 坚固的盾牌，中间有钢铆钉和纯金。
DS10.en_text: A sturdy shield with steel rivets and solid gold in the middle.

DS38.cn_text: 那些在盾牌上显示太阳标志的人将被称为真正的勇士。
DS38.en_text: Those who display the sign of the sun on their shields will be known as men of true valor.

DB04.cn_text: 一位著名的艺术家把传说中的龙直接雕刻在它的钢铁之上。
DB04.en_text: A renowned artist carved the legend dragons directly onto its steel.

DW31.cn_text: 这把剑是用纯钢制成的，很容易刺穿你的敌人。
DW31.en_text: This sword is made out of pure steel and will easily cut through your foe.

DH41.cn_text: 带有狭缝的封闭式钢制头盔，可在保护时提供可视性。
DH41.en_text: A closed steel helmet with narrow slits to allow visibility while being protected.

DS09.cn_text: 人性的双重特征在这个盾中清楚地反映出来。 据说这种盾牌符合西北地区战士的口味。
DS09.en_text: The duality of man is clearly reflected in this shield. This shield is said to bear the standard of a fierce people from the  North-West.

DB146.en_text: A plate steel armor made out of an irresistible blue.

DS37.cn_text: 在真正的血色十字军盾牌面前忏悔吧。
DS37.en_text: A bright red cross on a white shield in true crusader fashion.

DS44.cn_text: 这个盾牌上的彩绘符号会在战斗前的瞬间给你力量。
DS44.en_text: The painted symbols on this shield will give you strength in the moments before battle.

DB91.cn_text: 据说在这个胸甲上雕刻的树木花纹揭示了埋藏宝藏的位置。
DB91.en_text: The trees carved on this cuirass are said to reveal the location of a buried treasure.

DH54.cn_text: 没有什么比一顶黄金头盔更能彰显富有了。
DH54.en_text: Nothing says wealthy like a gold helmet.

DS08.cn_text: 圆形护盾，圆形边缘，让敌人的武器轻松滑落。
DS08.en_text: A circular shield with a rounded edge, letting enemy weapons slide off with ease.

DW25.cn_text: 重型钢钉锤，可对对手的头部造成重大伤害。
DW25.en_text: A heavy steel mace that can make significant damage to your opponent's head.

DS46.cn_text: 一个古老的骑士团设计了这个盾牌的布局和外观。
DS46.en_text: An ancient order of knights designed the layout and appearance of this shield.

DS36.cn_text: 镶有钢的条纹简约盾牌。
DS36.en_text: A striped simple shield rimmed with steel.

DB19.cn_text: 黑色皮革为这件胸甲增添了一丝优势。
DB19.en_text: The black leather adds a hint of dominance to this armor.

DB145.en_text: A simple white shirt with a splash of blue to make it stand out a bit.

DW24.cn_text: 这把斧头被残酷的士兵用于战斗。
DW24.en_text: This axe was made to be used in combat by brutal soldiers.

DB39.cn_text: 这款带衬垫的长款上衣虽然看起来不那么结实，但仍能保护你免受打击。
DB39.en_text: A padded aketon tunic that may not look so tough, but will still shield you from blows.

DS97.cn_text: 用钢和帆布制成的红色龙盾。
DS97.en_text: A red dragon shield made out of steel and canvas.

DB63.cn_text: 这款胸甲上的尖锐线条让人想起地平线上一座遥远的山峰。
DB63.en_text: The sharp lines on this cuirass reminds one of a distant mountain on the horizon.

DH52.cn_text: 带弯曲的圆锥形头盔，好似一个黄金面具。
DH52.en_text: A conical helmet with a bent gold mask.

DA56.cn_text: 当你在战场上击倒敌人时，让黄金的力量保护你的手臂。
DA56.en_text: Let the strength of gold protect your arms as you cut your enemies down on the battlefield.

DB90.cn_text: 一款灵活的链甲，由黑色皮带和肩带组成。
DB90.en_text: A flexible chainmail armor kept together by black leather belt and straps.

DW26.cn_text: 一把锋利边缘的精美短剑。
DW26.en_text: A fine short sword with sharp edges.

DW34.cn_text: 这把维京剑有一把金色的剑柄，只有一个真正的领主才配拥有。
DW34.en_text: This viking sword has a golden hilt and would only be owned by a true lord.

DW83.cn_text: 不要让明亮的色彩欺骗你，这刀刃仍然锋利而致命。
DW83.en_text: Don't let the bright yellow deceive you, this blade is still sharp and deadly like no other.

DB03.cn_text: 用史诗般的钢制锻造，绑有粗皮带。
DB03.en_text: Forged with epic steel and crude leather straps.

DW81.cn_text: 一把独特的匕首，可以在战场上给你一个锋利的优势。
DW81.en_text: A unique looking dagger that could give you a sharp edge on the battlefield.

DA59.cn_text: 钢和金结合在一起，提供最佳的手臂保护。
DA59.en_text: Layers of steel and gold come together to offer the ultimate arm protection.

DS99.cn_text: 这个盾牌的主人发誓要保护猫免受周围环境的影响。 不要轻易承担这个责任！
DS99.en_text: The owner of this shield is sworn to protect cats from all around the realm. Do not take this responsibility lightly!

DA50.cn_text: 这副重型钢铠护臂提供了出色的保护，同时装饰有金色的细纹。
DA50.en_text: Heavy steel pauldrons and gauntlets provide excellent protection, all adorned with a fine lines of gold.

DS94.cn_text: 装饰这种盾牌的黄金显著增加了这种盾牌的价值。
DS94.en_text: The gold that adorns this shield increases the value of this shield significantly.

DS06.cn_text: 一个凶猛的战士需要一个能反映他侵略性的盾牌。这个闪耀的狮子纹章会吓跑弱者。
DS06.en_text: A fierce warrior needs a shield that reflects his true agressions. This lion will scare off the weak.

DS07.cn_text: 这是一块由复杂的冶金技术制成的盾牌, 它将炫耀着领主的财富, 并为老国王传唱赞美颂歌。
DS07.en_text: An intricate piece of metallurgy, this shield will flaunt the wealth of its owner and sing praise to an old king.

DB78.cn_text: 制作这件防弹衣时使用了最好的锁甲。
DB78.en_text: The finest chainmail was used when crafting this body armor.

DB02.cn_text: 由一个熟练的工匠非常小心地打造而成。
DB02.en_text: Created with great care by a master craftsman.

DS110.en_text: A red shield with ornate decorations.

DS93.cn_text: 这种类型的盾牌非常古老，但它可以保护你免受敌人的伤害。
DS93.en_text: This type of shield is quite old-fashioned, but it will protect you from those who seek to harm you.

DW27.cn_text: 用剁或锤来击杀你的敌人，这是你的选择。
DW27.en_text: Finish your enemies with a chop or a thrust. The choice is yours.

DW22.cn_text: 有传言说波塞冬自己曾在远古世代里使用过这把剑。
DW22.en_text: It is rumored that Poseidon himself used this sword back in the days.

DB143.en_text: A rare type of leather dyed to attractive shades of white and blue.

DS115.en_text: Do not go out to see without the protection of your shield.

DB144.en_text: The assembled steel tiles show a strange logo on the chest. Could it be an ancient rune left by the forefathers?

DH14.cn_text: 一款完全由黄金制成的经典十字军头盔。 你的奉献将使教会感到高兴。
DH14.en_text: A classic crusader helmet made entirely out of gold. The church will be pleased by your devotion.

DS98.cn_text: 这种以维京为灵感的设计提醒我们，龙可能是真实的，即使它们不常见。
DS98.en_text: This viking inspired design reminds us that dragons probably are real, even if they aren't seen all too often.

DW79.cn_text: 一个来自东部大草原的游牧民带着这把剑，后来被一个勇敢的骑士使用。
DW79.en_text: A nomad from the eastern steppes was carrying this sword when a brave knight took him out.

DH125.en_text: A peculiar hat adorned by a strange emerald feather, plucked from a bird that is now extinct.

DS95.cn_text: 主命令你以他的名义前往遥远的国度并挥舞这块盾来掠夺异教徒的财富。
DS95.en_text: The lord commands you to travel to distant lands and pillage heathens in his name.

DH126.en_text: A masked norman helmet lined with gold and made out of emerald steel.

DH72.cn_text: 古代竞技场战士经常佩戴这种类型的头盔。
DH72.en_text: Ancient warriors of the arena often used to wear these types of helmets.

DA101.cn_text: TRON的龙魂注视着你，没有必要再惧怕任何敌人。
DA101.en_text: With the dragon spirit of TRON watching over you, there is no need to fear the enemy any longer.

DS92.cn_text: 带上它，用这个盾牌，没有什么可以伤害你。
DS92.en_text: Bring it on, with this shield, nothing can harm you.

DH73.cn_text: 这顶头盔的钢筋可以保护脸部，但仍然提供足够的空间来观察敌人。
DH73.en_text: The steel bar protect the face but still provide plenty of space to view the enemy.

DB34.cn_text: 为真正的战士制作的精美胸甲。
DB34.en_text: A fine cuirass made for real warriors.

DH82.cn_text: 一位智者曾经说过，北方人的入侵不会持续太久。 然而，他错了。
DH82.en_text: A wise man once said that the Northern invasion would not last long. He was wrong.

DB79.cn_text: 这款简约背心展现您的性感气质。
DB79.en_text: A simple vest that shows off your sensual nature.

DA42.cn_text: 一副使用了部落凯尔特涂装的板材护手。
DA42.en_text: Wrought iron plate armor with some tribal celtic paint drawn on it.

DS43.cn_text: 这是一款简洁而有吸引力的金属护盾，漆成白色。
DS43.en_text: A simple, yet appealing, metal shield painted in white.

DB01.cn_text: 精雕细琢的铁鳞片胸甲。
DB01.en_text: A finely crafted body armor of assembled iron scales.

DB60.cn_text: 穿上这件盔甲会让你获得骑士的真正威力。
DB60.en_text: Donning this armor will give you grant you the true might of knighthood.

DB142.en_text: A white body armor the likes of which has never been seen.

DH23.cn_text: 这顶头盔可以保护您的面部免受迎面而来的打击。
DH23.en_text: The steel bars will protect your face from oncoming blows.

DW23.cn_text: 这把剑只适用于真正的信徒，同时又可以造成很大伤害。
DW23.en_text: This sword is meant only for true believers, but it will serve whoever acquires it well.

DH34.cn_text: 这款黑色十字军头盔上饰有青铜十字架，展现出对主的虔诚。
DH34.en_text: This black crusader helme is adorned with a bronze cross and will show off your lord's piety.

DS60.cn_text: 这件盾牌由一块古老的铁制成，可以保护你免受敌人的伤害。
DS60.en_text: Crafted from an ancient piece of iron, this shield will protect you from all your foes.

DH68.cn_text: 这款头盔有许多狭缝使得呼吸和观察更容易，同时保持头部受到充分保护。
DH68.en_text: Many slits make breathing and viewing easier while keeping your head fully protected.

DW80.cn_text: 这把剑的独特曲率是专门设计过的，每次刺伤都会造成最大的疼痛。
DW80.en_text: The unique curvature of this sword is specifically designed to inflict the most amount of pain with each stab.

DH84.cn_text: 这款头盔的设计灵感来自古希腊人，完全由黄金制成。
DH84.en_text: This helmet's design was inspired by the ancient greeks and is made entirely out of gold.

DB141.en_text: A white armor with a solid blue line added to it that truly makes it stand out.

DA100.cn_text: 这款重金护手是财富的标志，更代表着战场上的威力。
DA100.en_text: Heavy gold arm protection is a great sign of wealth, and prowess on the battlefield.

DH124.en_text: The thick lines of gold may add a bit of extra weight, but they will display your wealth to those who face your might.

DW82.cn_text: 这种轻型刀片可以极速出击，并且可以迅速切割敌人的皮肤。
DW82.en_text: This light blade can be used with extreme speed and will slice your enemy's skin like nothing else.

DS100.cn_text: 金龙命令你寻找遥远的土地，并以他的名义掠夺你的敌人。
DS100.en_text: The golden dragon orders you to seek out distant lands and plunder your foes in his name.

DA69.cn_text: 它可能饱经风霜，但这副护手会保护你渡过很多艰难的战斗。
DA69.en_text: It may have seen better days, but this armor will get you through some tough fights.

DB89.cn_text: 这款胸甲由铁和金制成，可以保证您的安全，并始终保持雄伟。
DB89.en_text: Stengthened by iron and gold, this cuirass will keep you safe and looking majestic at all times.

DA82.cn_text: 那些在最强敌人的猛攻中幸存下来的人将在战场上获得真正的荣耀。
DA82.en_text: Those who survive the greatest enemy onslaughts will gain true glory on the battlefield.

DB77.cn_text: 受到拜占庭人的启发，这件防弹衣将保护您的受保护并展现您的奉献精神。
DB77.en_text: Inspired by the byzantines, this body armor will keep your protected and show your devotion.

DW88.cn_text: 这把剑很久以前就在一场著名的战斗中使用过，现在到了你的手中。
DW88.en_text: This sword was used during a famous battle long ago, and has now come to your possession.

DB140.en_text: A black vest with an irresistible look to it.

DS02.cn_text: 一个神秘的战争领主曾经挥舞这个盾牌作为保护。现在，它也能保护你吗？
DS02.en_text: A mystical warlord once rode with this shield as protection. Can it protect you too?

DB33.cn_text: 向那些穷光蛋们炫耀你的财富之甲吧！其他人都会嫉妒你的。
DB33.en_text: Flaunt your wealth to those who have less. Others are guaranteed to be jealous.

DA99.cn_text: 这款精心制作的镀金护手可以摧毁敌人的心灵和思想。
DA99.en_text: Claw out the hearts and minds of your enemies with this finely crafted set of plated arm protection.

DH22.cn_text: 一顶封闭式的头盔，它将保卫领主的头部安全。
DH22.en_text: A closed helmet that will keep your lord safe and sound.

DW84.cn_text: 国王和领主都将这把剑视为家族的遗产。
DW84.en_text: Kings and lords alike have seen the legacy of their houses cut down with this sword.

DS05.cn_text: 这种坚固的钢制盾牌不仅能保护你免受各种武器的攻击, 还可以用来反射阳光, 致盲你的敌人。
DS05.en_text: Not only does this solid steel shield protect you from all sorts of weapons, it can also be used to reflect sunlight to blind attacking foes.

DH26.cn_text: 一层薄薄的青铜将让你在战场上有一个独特的表现。
DH26.en_text: A thin layer of bronze will give you a distinct look on the battlefield.

DW30.cn_text: 一把致命的维京剑，带有坚固的剑柄，可以提高士兵的掌控力。
DW30.en_text: A deadly viking sword with a sturdy hilt that improves the soldier's grip.

DS90.cn_text: 让敌人的攻击冲着你来吧，这块盾牌会保护你。
DS90.en_text: Let the enemy attacks wash over you. They will not hurt.

DH69.cn_text: 一个带有大量开口缝隙的钢制头盔，可以加强观察并保持顺畅呼吸。
DH69.en_text: A steel helmet with plenty of open slits to view and breathe out of.

DS04.cn_text: 一只狮子是不够的，盾牌上的多个狮子纹章展示着你的强势。
DS04.en_text: One lion is seldom enough. Show how powerful you are with many of them adorning your shield.

DB139.en_text: Black chainmail armor will give your warrior a particularly terrifying edge.

DS101.cn_text: 用这个美妙的盾牌保护你的人民。
DS101.en_text: Protect your people with this wonderful shield.

DW78.cn_text: 一把美丽的青铜匕首受到许多收藏家的追捧。
DW78.en_text: A beautiful bronze dagger sought after by many collectors.

DW39.cn_text: 一把精湛的剑，可以让你的敌人胆寒。
DW39.en_text: A masterly sword that will leave your enemies non plussed.

DA102.cn_text: 利用这种独特的臂甲释放NEO区块链的力量。
DA102.en_text: Unleash the power of the NEO blockchain with this unique arm protection.

DH123.en_text: The emerald cage protects it's owners but could also draw unwanted attention on the battlefield.

DA98.cn_text: 混合毛皮和板甲的护手为您的领主带来粗犷的外观。
DA98.en_text: A mix of fur and plate armor gives your lord a rugged look.

DW44.cn_text: 一把纯净的剑，可以根据你的意愿砍杀你的敌人。
DW44.en_text: A pure sword that will slash and pierce your enemies as you wish.

DS91.cn_text: 粗糙，风化，仍然站立。 这个盾牌幸存下来了。
DS91.en_text: Rough, weathered, and still standing. This shield has survived the worst.

DB59.cn_text: 链甲上装有皮革镶甲铠，保护你的领主免受猛烈撞击。
DB59.en_text: A leather brigandine armor on top of chainmail to protect your lord from tough blows.

DH129.en_text: The bronze nose guard will protect your face without being introsive.

DA97.cn_text: 一位工匠说，用于制造这种护手的黄金有点稀释，但它仍然会在战斗中保护你。
DA97.en_text: One craftsman says that the gold used to craft this arm protection was a bit diluted, but it will still protect you during battles.

DW86.cn_text: 一位意大利商人将这把剑带到了我们的土地上，为此也付出了惊人的代价。
DW86.en_text: An Italian merchant brought this sword to our lands and fetched a marvelous price for it.

DS03.cn_text: 在战争的锤炼中越来越坚硬, 这个盾牌可以将恐惧直接打进你敌人心中。
DS03.en_text: Hardened by battle, this shield will strike fear in the hearts of your enemies.

DH27.cn_text: 由黄金制成的头盔，带有可移动的遮阳板和防护面罩。
DH27.en_text: A helmet made out of gold with a movable visor and protective face guard.

DB138.en_text: A dark steel armor carved with an evil dragon.

DB137.en_text: A thick armor inspired by the roaring sea of the Atlantic.

DH67.cn_text: 领主可以从这个威胁性的缝隙中紧盯对手。
DH67.en_text: Stare down your opponent out of this menacing slit.

DS01.cn_text: 这款坚固的盾牌采用金属边框并涂上鲜艳的颜色，可在需要时为您提供保护。
DS01.en_text: Rimmed with metal and painted in bright colors, this sturdy shield will protect you when needed.

DH33.cn_text: 装饰有金色十字架的伟大十字军头盔，戴上它就可以将恐惧直插入异教徒的心脏。
DH33.en_text: A crusader great helm adorned with a gold cross with the power to strike fear into the heart of heathens.

DW85.cn_text: 这把剑此穿过无数的胸膛。
DW85.en_text: Many hearts have been broken with a single thrust from this sword.

DB32.cn_text: 钢铁和黄金的力量融入了这一美丽的胸甲之中。
DB32.en_text: The power of steel and gold meshes into a beautiful spectacle of armor.

DS87.cn_text: 黄色盾牌，可抵御敌人的攻击。
DS87.en_text: A yellow shield that will hold up against enemy attacks.

DA128.en_text: Chainmail, bracers, and shoulder pads for ultimate mobility and protection.

DH122.en_text: The emerald bars will protect your face from harm against all blows.

DB136.en_text: The open sea awaits only the bravest of knights. What enemies will you face on the other side?

DB76.cn_text: 三月，用这件精美的上衣以主的名义征服。
DB76.en_text: March forth and conquer in the name of the lord with this fine tunic.

DW16.cn_text: 一把金剑，可以轻易刺伤你的敌人。
DW16.en_text: A golden sword to stab your foes.

DA52.cn_text: 只有最强大的男性才配穿戴这副护手。
DA52.en_text: Only the most powerful of men will be able to handle this set of plated arm protection.

DA96.cn_text: 这个覆盖着铠甲片的护手饱经风霜，但仍然会为它的主人提供一些保护。
DA96.en_text: This overlaying pauldron has seen better days but will still offer a bit of protection to its owner.

DH18.cn_text: 万全由青铜打造的诺曼头盔。
DH18.en_text: A Norman helmet made entirely out of bronze.

DW47.cn_text: 设计独特的剑，带有弧形护柄。
DW47.en_text: A uniquely designed sword with a curved cross-guard.

DW19.cn_text: 用银制成的剑，可以炫耀你的财富。
DW19.en_text: A sword made out of silver will flaunt your wealth.

DA127.en_text: Layers of leather and tight straps provide great protection and mobility.

DA81.cn_text: 捍卫领主所真正拥有的一切。
DA81.en_text: Protecting what is rightfully yours is the main purpose of a true lord. Do not do so unprotected.

DS89.cn_text: 这块盾牌可以祈求天空中众神的力量来保护你。
DS89.en_text: Use the power of the great man in the sky to protect you.

DA95.cn_text: 从铠甲片中悬挂的厚皮条将提供一些额外的保护。
DA95.en_text: Thick leather strips hanging from the pauldron will offer a little bit of extra protection.

DH21.cn_text: 只为最高贵的领主创造的精美头盔。
DH21.en_text: A fine helmet created for only the noblest of lords.

DS119.en_text: A darkened blue shield made out of wood. Some strange ship seems to be burned onto its surface.

DS88.cn_text: 相信这个青铜盾牌，它可能会在某一天保护你。
DS88.en_text: Trust in this bronze shield and you might see it through the day.

DB31.cn_text: 这款青铜胸甲饰有金色线条，突出了你力量的真实本质。
DB31.en_text: This bronze cuirass is adorned with lines of gold to accentuate the true nature of your might.

DS86.en_text: A blue shield that is quite unique in style.

DS85.en_text: A red canvas shield that is light in weight.

DW72.cn_text: 黄金晨星不仅会粉碎敌人的头部，还会让他在死前嫉妒。
DW72.en_text: A gold morningstar will not only crush your enemy's head, it will also make him jealous right before he dies.

DA94.cn_text: 这款沉重的铁质盔甲护手采用有趣的颜色涂装，非常独特。
DA94.en_text: This heavy iron armor is tinted with an interesting color, making it quite unique.

DW87.cn_text: 一把古怪的剑，只有最自信的领主才能脱身。
DW87.en_text: An eccentric looking sword that only the most confident lords can pull off.

DW18.cn_text: 更适合领主使用的青铜剑。
DW18.en_text: A bronze sword fit for a lord.

DB58.cn_text: 这款巴克皮甲采用保护铆钉装饰，可确保领主的安全。
DB58.en_text: This buck skin armor is adorned with protective rivets and will keep your lord safe.

DW14.cn_text: 长矛带有青铜尖，很容易刺穿敌人的皮肤。
DW14.en_text: A long spear with a bronze tip that will easily pierce the skin of your enemies.

DW15.cn_text: 从远东开始，这支矛的尖端完全出自地球上最纯粹的玉石。
DW15.en_text: A rarity from the far east, this spear has a tip made entirely out of  the greenest jade on earth.

DA126.en_text: The sheer amount of steel used to craft this arm protection makes it almost sinful, but it is still highly efficient.

DW71.cn_text: 一个坚固的铁晨星，将威胁和摧毁你所有的敌人。
DW71.en_text: A sturdy iron morningstar club that will intimidate and destroy all your foes.

DW96.cn_text: 这把剑是为了战斗而锻造的。 不要让它失望。
DW96.en_text: This sword was forged for battle. Do not disappoint it.

DH121.en_text: Getting the helmet's steel to such a pure shade of white takes an unbelievable amount of time.

DB134.en_text: A leather brigandine with fine studs and heavy clasps.

DW20.cn_text: 一把双刃剑，因过去不断的维京人入侵而受到欢迎。
DW20.en_text: A double-edged axe made popular by the incessant viking invasions of the past.

DH16.cn_text: 戴上这顶青铜十字军头盔，展示你作为领主对教廷的热爱。
DH16.en_text: Show your lord's devotion to the church with this bronze crusader helmet.

DA93.cn_text: 稀有品种狐狸的毛皮被用来制造这套强大的护手。
DA93.en_text: The pelt of a rare breed of foxes was used to create this imposing set of arm protection.

DW102.cn_text: 根据传说，一位年轻的战士用他敌人之血，骨和钢制作了这支长矛。 那个英雄的名字？孙宇晨
DW102.en_text: According to legends, a young warrior crafted this spear with the blood, bones, and steel of his enemies. That hero's name? Justin Sun.

DW17.cn_text: 用来恐吓敌人的青铜剑。
DW17.en_text: A bronze sword to intimidate the enemy.

DH127.en_text: An emerald steel mask that will strike fear and awe into your foes.

DB36.cn_text: 染成红色的铆钉皮革胸甲。
DB36.en_text: A riveted leather armor dyed in red.

DH32.cn_text: 这是一顶附有银色十字架装饰的十字军头盔，只有虔诚的信徒才可以穿戴。
DH32.en_text: A crusader helmet adorned with a silver cross. May only be worn by the pious.

DA125.en_text: Made out of the finest emerald steel of the land.

DH11.cn_text: 一个完全由青铜制成的巴塞头盔。
DH11.en_text: A bascinet helmet made entirely out of bronze.

DW95.cn_text: 很少有盾牌能够抵挡这把剑的凶悍。
DW95.en_text: Few shields have been able to withstand the fierceness of this sword.

DW75.cn_text: 这把薄青铜匕首可以穿过锁子甲，并会深深的刺入并造成永久性伤害。
DW75.en_text: This thin bronze dagger can pierce through chainmail and will go deep enough to instill permanent damage.

DH66.cn_text: 一种典型但可靠的封闭式头盔，由坚固的钢制成。
DH66.en_text: A typical, but reliable, closed helmet made out of strong steel.

DS84.cn_text: 绿松石帆布盾牌，重量轻。
DS84.en_text: A turquoise canvas shield that is light in weight.

DH120.en_text: A black doo rag that will make you look much cooler than your peers.

DA92.cn_text: 勇敢的骑士经常在大战之后出售他们的护手。 这款特别粗暴。
DA92.en_text: Brave knights often sell their armor after great battles. This one was particularly roughed up.

DB30.cn_text: 这件胸甲让你想起当年人民生活在恐惧中的日子。
DB30.en_text: Reminds one of the old days when your people were feared across the world.

DA124.en_text: An emerald steel set of arm protection, exceptionally rare and durable.

DW12.cn_text: 这款矛设计简单，但有一个由纯金制成的矛尖。
DW12.en_text: This spear is simply designed but has a tip made out of solid gold.

DH74.cn_text: 使用大量的强化金来保护您的脸部，这是完美的经济意义。
DH74.en_text: Using large amounts of reinforced gold to protect your face makes perfect financial sense.

DW89.cn_text: 这把剑将刺入你敌人的心脏。
DW89.en_text: Stab your enemies in the heart with a proper sword for once.

DB133.en_text: Flashy and adorned with diamonds, one would be a fool to ignore the elegance of this vest.

DB88.cn_text: 锻造这支胸甲的铁匠的灵感来自于太阳升起时的壮丽景象。
DB88.en_text: The blacksmith who forged this cuirass was inspired by the awesomeness of the rising sun.

DB135.en_text: This armor is fit for a true legend. Let the games begin!

DA91.cn_text: 几年前，这种护手被用于保卫一个著名的城市。 它经受住了时间的考验。
DA91.en_text: This armor was used in the defense of a renowned city years ago. It has stood the test of time.

DH12.cn_text: 用黑暗的巴塞头盔遮住你的脸。
DH12.en_text: Cover your face with a darkened bascinet helmet.

DA123.en_text: Simple linen shirt with a small trace of color to make it pop.

DH20.cn_text: 采用实心黄金打造的诺曼头盔。
DH20.en_text: A Norman helmet with reinforced with solid gold.

DS82.en_text: A blue canvas shield that is light in weight.

DS83.en_text: A green canvas shield that is light in weight.

DA122.en_text: A bit gruff perhaps, but efficient nevertheless.

DA64.cn_text: 蓝色钢铠和铁拳设计将让领主在战场上拥有无穷的力量。
DA64.en_text: Blue pauldrons and an iron fist for ultimate defnsive might.

DA58.cn_text: 分层的青铜和钢板为手臂提供坚固的保护，但移动性会因此受限。
DA58.en_text: Layered bronze and steel plates provides tough protection but little mobility.

DB57.cn_text: 精雕细琢的铁胸甲，雕刻的线条如同蜘蛛网一般。
DB57.en_text: A finely crafted iron cuirass with carved lines that remind one of a spider's net.

DW13.cn_text: 长矛，长有坚固的金尖。 被刺穿的人可能会对这种精致的死亡感激不尽。
DW13.en_text: A long spear with a solid gold tip. Those pierced by its thrust may be grateful for such a fine death.

DH70.cn_text: 据说这顶头盔多年前保护了一位聪明骑士的头部。
DH70.en_text: This helmet is said to have protected the head of a wise knight many years ago.

DA90.cn_text: 铁手套，铠甲片和护腕提供了全面的保护，但对许多人来说可能有点太沉了。
DA90.en_text: Iron gauntlets, pauldrons, and bracers offer full protection but might be a bit heavy for many.

DS81.cn_text: 穿过钢盾的棕色帆布提供了很好的保护，看起来很棒。
DS81.en_text: Brown canvas stretched across a steel shield offers great protection and looks great.

DW105.en_text: A gold heilt and black grip make this sword truly unique.

DH25.cn_text: 这款头盔采用费德里奥风格，提供良好的遮盖和充足的头部空间。
DH25.en_text: This barbute helmet is in the fidelio style, providing good cover and plenty of head space.

DB132.en_text: Padded and with solid clasps, the designer of this piece insists it be worn only by the noblest of lords.

DB75.cn_text: 显然挥舞你的信仰是炫耀你的奉献精神的最佳方式。
DB75.en_text: Clearly brandishing your faith is the best way to show off your devotion.

DA89.cn_text: 这些黄金护手曾经在他们的全新时期看起来很壮观，但是敌人的攻击已经将它的一些光芒夺走了。
DA89.en_text: These golden plates used to look magnificent in their prime, but enemy attacks have taken some of its shine away.

DW69.cn_text: 精雕细琢的金色矛头，让您看起来更加恐怖，同时又显得富有。
DW69.en_text: A finely carved golden spearhead to make you look intimidating and wealthy at the same time.

DA120.en_text: The single plate of golds brings attention to the eye without compromising its overall protection prowess.

DA121.en_text: Intricate layers of colorful textile will offer more protection than you think, and certainly improve your looks.

DA65.cn_text: 这些黄金的板材最终造就了这独一无二的护手。
DA65.en_text: These golden plates may have seen better days, but they still get the job done.

DH119.en_text: The sea warriors who crafted this helmet are said to have conquered most of the east at some point in time.

DS80.cn_text: 精心制作的盾牌，无可挑剔。
DS80.en_text: A shield crafted with great care and in impeccable condition.

DW11.en_text: Woe unto the soldier who is on the receiving end of this deadly spear.

DH118.en_text: The blue cross is considered blasphemous by some, but look how splendid it is!

DW129.en_text: The pointiest spear in the realm, it symbolizes the power of knowing your dapp metrics.

DW21.cn_text: 这支长矛有三个可以造成严重伤害的刀刃。
DW21.en_text: This spear has three blades that can do severe damage.

DB29.cn_text: 罗马皇帝可能会喜欢穿这样的东西。
DB29.en_text: The emperor of Rome probably would've liked to wear something like this.

DA119.en_text: The seal of loom greatly increases the value of this limited edition arm protection.

DA37.cn_text: 戴上这一钢铠护手，你就拥有了一套提供移动性的手臂保护装置。
DA37.en_text: Laced up gloves and steel pauldrons for a mobile set of arm protection.

DH65.cn_text: 这款三角形头盔采用叶形遮阳板进行防御加强，使其从很多设计中脱颖而出。
DH65.en_text: This sallet helmet has been enhanced with a leaf-shaped visor, making it stand out from the rabble.

DW70.cn_text: 这支长矛可以让你在敌人到达之前就对他们造成杀伤。
DW70.en_text: This spear will allow you to hurt your enemies before they can even reach you.

DW09.cn_text: 力量雄伟的狮子剑，精心制作的黑色手柄。
DW09.en_text: A powrful lion sword with a finely crafted black grip.

DH31.cn_text: 这款带有金色十字架的黑色十字军头盔将展现您对于主的真正忠诚。
DH31.en_text: This black crusader helmet with a golden cross will show off your true devotion to the lord.

DW10.cn_text: 这支长矛有两个刀片，使其具有两倍的致命威胁。
DW10.en_text: This long spear has two blades, making it twice as deadly.

DA36.cn_text: 黄金铠片提供肩部保护，并使得这副系带护手更加突出。
DA36.en_text: Golden pauldrons provide shoulder protection and highlights the laced gloves of this set.

DW68.cn_text: 这支长矛既可以投掷，也可以用作近战武器来阻挡来袭。
DW68.en_text: This spear can either be thrown at charging foes, or used as a melee weapon to block incoming blows.

DB28.cn_text: 这件胸甲的颜色让人回想起古代波斯的田野。
DB28.en_text: The color of this armour takes one back to the fields of ancient Persia.

DW08.cn_text: 狮子的力量通过这片刀片源源渗出。
DW08.en_text: The power and strength of the lion oozes through this blade.

DW65.cn_text: 创新的斧头设计将使其在战场上的战斗变得更加容易。
DW65.en_text: An innovative hatchet design will make fighting on the battlefield much easier.

DS79.cn_text: 许多骑士说他们的盾牌质量比他们的武器质量更重要。
DS79.en_text: Many knights say the quality of their shields is more important than the quality of their weapons.

DB131.en_text: Only a king could pull this off, but maybe you should try it on just in case?

DA41.cn_text: 一套强大的镀金装甲和系带护腕。
DA41.en_text: A powerful set of plated armor and laced bracers.

DW07.cn_text: 这把剑是为真正的领主而制造的。
DW07.en_text: This sword was made for a true lord.

DA35.cn_text: 这些系带皮手套紧紧绑定手臂，以确保您能更舒适的握剑。
DA35.en_text: These laced leather gloves are tightly bound to ensure your sword grip.

DH80.cn_text: 专业设计的头盔，可保护头部和眼睛免受伤害。
DH80.en_text: An expertly designed helmet that will protect the head and the eyes from harm.

DB27.cn_text: 这种胸甲让人联想起昔日古典英雄的荣耀之一。
DB27.en_text: An armor that reminds one of the former glory of classical heroes.

DW64.cn_text: 这把斧头有一个木轴和一个精雕细刻的青铜头。
DW64.en_text: This axe has a wooden shaft and an intricately carved bronze head.

DW63.cn_text: 为一个凶悍的战士创造了一把斧头。
DW63.en_text: A fierce axe created for a fierce warrior.

DB130.en_text: A red tunic with thick black leather belt. Is that buckle made out of silver?

DB35.cn_text: 这款皮革胸甲饰有防护铆钉，采用蓝色染色，带来华丽的外观。
DB35.en_text: Covered with protective rivets, this leather armor is dyed in blue to give a look of splendor.

DH117.en_text: Blue steel is exceptionally rare in these parts of the world, meaning this helmet should be cherished.

DH10.cn_text: 镀金的巴塞头盔，配有可旋转的遮阳挡板。
DH10.en_text: A bascinet helmet plated with gold with a rotating visor.

DA60.cn_text: 精心制作的护手，是一件美丽而实用的艺术品。
